```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Setup environment
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggmice)
```


Load data and take a single mids object to develop plots.
```{r}
imps <- readRDS("MS_imps.RDS")
imp1 <- imps[[1]]
dat1 <- imp1$data
```

Plot the missing data pattern
```{r}
mice::md.pattern(dat1)

plot_pattern(dat1[, -5])
```
